RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOT AS BLUE BLAZES dueled on the lead throughout, was headed in mid stretch while between horses, came again and drew clear late under firm handling. DONNARUMMA was well placed early, swung wide in the stretch, drew even mid stretch, was outfinished late but was second best. ASHWICKEN was allowed to settle early, rallied on the inside and gained a slight lead and weakened late. LITTLE FOUR dueled on the lead and weakened in mid stretch. IMA SURE BET pressed the pace on the rail and gave way in the stretch. ICY RAIN was outrun.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRINCESS SOLITAIRE was away alertly and quickly made the lead, led throughout and drifted out in the stretch, widened late under right handed urging. I MATTER was allowed to settle early, rallied on the inside and was second best. IRON BERTIE chased the winner throughout and went evenly late. MARIMBA had good position three wide and lacked a late response. DANCING FOR MONEY raced on the inside and was no menace. PACKIN was no factor. SPYENTIST saved ground and was outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio R egistered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROAD TEST chased the early speed, rallied on the far turn and gained a slight lead, battled through the stretch and prevailed, gamely. PETTIGO GIRL was never far back, rallied on the far turn and drew close, battled gamely and just missed. GOOD ALTERNATIVE was unhurried early, swung wide, in the stretch and closed a gap. GOLDEN TEMPLE was allowed to settle early, rallied, on the far turn, went evenly late and was vanned off. WOLF EYES raced mid pack and was no threat. FASHION FRAME set the pace for three quarters, then gave way. MANHATTAN LADY raced mid pack and gave way. NINJA KITTEN raced close up early and tired on the far turn.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: SMOOCHER was unhurried early, swung mid track in the stretch, closed fast and drew off. PEDAL TO DA KETTLE was allowed to settle early, rallied in the stretch and was up for place OHIO RIVER dueled on the lead, shook clear in mid stretch and weakened late. IPPOLITO'S WONDER dueled, on the lead while between horses and gave way. JOHN'S WILD RIVER dueled three wide and tired in the stretch. WHY KENNY WHY was no threat. RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 56. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 12 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In WeightAllowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARVIN'S EXPRESS vied for the lead throughout, shook clear in the stretch and remained clear late under firm handling . RED HEAD KID pressed the pace throughout, came again late for place. LITTLE RONS ROCKET had good position early, rallied down the backside, dueled on the lead until the top of the stretch and weakened late. TWINSPIREDJOEY set pressured pace and weakened. THE GOSPEL OF MARK was unhurried early and passed tiring rivals. MUCH TIMES TWO was well placed early and lacked a late response. JUST INSPIRED was no threat. GOING PRIMETIME was outrun. SWEET JILL'S JACK was no factor . The rider of RED HEADED KID claimed foul against the rider of MARVINS EXPRESS for alleged interference at the three eight pole. After viewing the tape the stewards took no action.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWICE AS SMART dueled on the lead, shook clear in the stretch, widened late, driving. JUSTINSPEIGHTOFIT vied for the early lead, dropped back slightly on the turn, came again five wide and was up for place. INGERSOLL dueled with the winner and weakened slightly late. EL SICARIO pressed the early pace, angled in stretch, put in a bid mid stretch and went evenly late. COAL TOWN ROAD had early foot and weakened. GOLDEN OAK trailed.
